content.description: Mossy moss moss... Loaded up and started around the left, Work your way all along the most exposed posterior edges, to dismount on the right. Get creative, forwards and back. Bonus if you can connect this piece, and ring this one round the front.
content.location: Small boulder to the left of The Slice Boulder. Covered in moss, its edges are exposed.

content.description:
Depends on your hand variations, 

increases your grade. 

Walk this one up over the left side,

Over the top and down the other side,

Reconnecting to the beginning.

Go again if you like,

Forward and back.
content.location:
Traverse the whole triangle, 

however you like. 

I’m a simple, safe lady however.

content.description:
Lots of different holds, for good practice and easy enough traversing, Many variations available.  Add a heal hook or two, Crux depends on you. Left to right or right to left

and back of course.
content.location: Load up as far left or right as you can, and get funky in your steps, Look at spreading the cheese.

content.description: Looks like a slice of cheese, Pizza? Swiss? Mmmmm
